channel.title: Application on Wish You Were Beer!

item.title: Caret
item.description: For some reason I have a weakness for Markdown editors. When I used a MacBook, I started with OmmWriter and later used Byword. I’ve been going with Ulysses lately. Windows has been a more difficult platform to find programs in this area. I have tried various programs from time to time, but have never been able to find a properly working program with the features I want. Caret has been a gem for me that I haven’t been able to find for years.
